title: Smithsonian interview with Chip Kidd
content:
Smithsonian Magazine has an [interview](http://web.archive.org/web/20071031113215/http:/www.smithsonianmag.com/arts-culture/atm-qanda-200711.html) with Chip Kidd, who received a 2007 Cooper-Hewitt [National Design Award](http://web.archive.org/web/20071031113215/http:/www.nationaldesignawards.org/award.asp?catID=cd&nameID=kidd) for his book covers.
